duties_responsibilities.duty: Define and scope out product specifications for the next 10 years, focusing on emerging cloud technologies and generative AI.
Lead the definition of product architecture and features for the next 5 to 10 years, emphasizing simplicity, coherence, and longevity.
Design process improvements for technical product and engineering teams, ensuring effective and efficient operations.
Review work and provide coaching to maintain a high-quality standard within the team.

education_certification.credential: University degree in an Engineering field, with 10+ years of experience in software product development and 5+ years in senior architecture and design roles.
